page.title: 02Domesday - A child's view.
page.content:
{by Anna Vile
I have enjoyed finding out about my area.I was born in Stourport and have always lived here but have found out more about local industries and farming since starting this project. It has been great working within a class and also small groups exploring the countryside.We found a vineyard at Astley Burf which I didn't know existed,it was great getting out of the classroom!I feel proud to have been a part of something that will produce a record that will last and give people in the future a look at how we lived in the Stourport area and the rest of the country in 1985.The original Domesday book of 1086 has given us information about England at that time and our record will be just as important in the future.
